text: Plan A Wedding And Get Matched With A Celebrity Groom! by Stephanie Harper â€“ on Jun 18th in Entertainment Getting married is such an exciting adventure! The weeks leading up to the wedding day are filled to the brim with planning and organizing. A lot of the planning has to do with finding the perfect flowers, music, wedding gown, diamond ring, and superstitious accessories like something borrowed and something blue. When it comes to finding the perfect wedding flowers, would you be interested in irises, carnations, or roses? What about hydrangeas, dahlias, or daffodils? When it comes to wedding music, would you want classical music or modern music? It might be difficult to decide!
